name: tumblr - Techno Control Panel
description: NOTE: As of 01.01.2013 this style will no longer be supported. Changes tumblr top right Control Panel to a set of on/off rocker switches.
additional_info: NOTE: Actual counts will display when style is installed. This style was designed as an experiment only and therefore will not be supported. If you wish to examine the code, data URIs were used for the two images, so the code may look like gibberish :)
